description: A fortune teller is reading the palm of an enormous, hairy hand. The juxtaposition of the seemingly mundane fortune-telling setting with the monstrously large, hairy hand is surreal and highlights the absurdity of trying to apply conventional predictions to something so fundamentally different and unusual. The fortune teller's advice, fitting for human concerns (short people and tall structures), is delivered without acknowledging the bizarre nature of her client, adding to the deadpan humor and irony. The specific warning about "short blondes and tall buildings" is a darkly humorous prediction delivered to an entity whose sheer size makes such threats seem insignificant or perhaps introduces an entirely new dimension of potential threats.
caption: "And you should definitely stay away from short blondes and tall buildings."
